title: The Slow Professor
text: The Slow Professor: Challenging the Culture of Speed in the Academy (cloth ; paper ; <a href="EPUB">EPUB</a> e-book ) is a book by <a href="Maggie%20Berg">Maggie Berg</a> and <a href="Barbara%20K.%20Seeber">Barbara K. Seeber</a> published by <a href="University%20of%20Toronto%20Press">University of Toronto Press</a>. The authors challenge the haste in modern universities caused by their corporatization.
